name: GTA5-Mods Dark Theme - Updated and Improved
description:
An edit of the userstyle by Nick Brealey.

Mostly just fixes, but also some improvements for elements which weren't colored. 
I also fixed the coloring for admins/moderators (I am a moderator on the site).

For any bug reports or fixes please go to the Git repo: https://gitlab.com/Jitnaught/GTA5ModsDarkTheme
